item.title: ASICS introduces its lightest-ever cushioning shoe for runners
item.description:
Source: ASICS. The DynaFlyte. ASICS has released its lightest cushioned running shoe to date. The DynaFlyte combines lightness and cushioning with a full-length FlyteFoam midsole, utilizing the company’s patented midsole technology in its most basic form. According to ASICS, the shoe’s reduced weight minimizes energy loss during the stride, resulting in more efficient running and the potential for increased speed at any distance. Balancing efficient cushioning with minimizing weight is a significant challenge in running shoe design...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/asics-introduces-its-lightest-ever-cushioning-shoe-for-runners/
